Dearborn.Mudgie's Deli: Mudgie's Deli is a restaurant in Detroit, Michigan. It was nominated for "Best Deli" and "Best Soup" two years in a row by WDIV-TV through their "Click On Detroit" website, and won "Best Deli in Wayne County" in the Metro Times "Best of Detroit" in 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014, and "Best Sandwich in Wayne County" in 2015. Mudgie's was awarded "Best Sandwich" by Hour Detroit Magazine in 2012.
